SectionAbout.p: I am a web developer with +4 years of experience using frontend and backend technologies. I have worked in high-growth startup companies where the challenges and the day-to-day are variable and of high learning. Also my digital business.
SectionAbout.p2: Without realizing it, the years in technology go by very quickly so it is important to keep up to date and review the constant updates.

SectionSkills.p: Throughout all these years there are many technologies that I have tried and many experiences that I have lived. But very useful to develop functional, secure and scalable software.

data.title: Profile
description: Professional with technical studies and self-taught in my free time I am a web developer with more than 4 years of experience developing applications for frontend, backend, API's and microservices.

Programming, Android, Networking, Operating Systems, English 3, Mathematics 3, Accounting and Statistics are some of the most outstanding courses.
